meanings.sent1: The seductresses in the movie used their charm to attract the main character.
meanings.sent2: The seductresses at the party captivated everyone with their alluring presence.
meanings.sent3: The seductresses in the play made the audience laugh with their clever tricks.
meanings.sent4: The seductresses of nature enticed the animals with their sweet scents.
meanings.sent5: The seductresses in the novel were described as irresistible and mysterious.

meanings.sent1: In the story, the seductresses plotted to win over the hearts of the men in town.
meanings.sent2: The seductresses in the painting were depicted as powerful and alluring figures.
meanings.sent3: The seductresses in the comedy caused chaos with their flirtatious behavior.
meanings.sent4: The seductresses of the night sky lured travelers with their twinkling beauty.
meanings.sent5: The seductresses in the legend were known for their irresistible charm and cunning ways.
